product_name: The North Face Montana Gloves - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Montana gloves offer adventurous girls the insulated and waterproof protection they need for alpine fun in cold, wet weather. HyVent(R) nylon shells are waterproof, breathable and windproof for wide range of comfort. Heatseeker(TM) polyester insulation provides warmth without bulkiness for enhanced dexterity. Brushed polyester tricot linings help keep hands dry and comfortable. Powder cuffs with drawcord closures and ladderlock cinch wrists help seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. The North Face Montana gloves feature zippered pockets that are perfect for hand warmers (sold separately).
